title: To Paint a Life
description: When Alessio swears to never pick up a paint brush again he hopes it will be the end of his troubles. Unfortunately, an American girl appears who not only knows of his gift, but insists he paint her father back to life. Suddenly Alessio is trapped between a greedy criminal gang that runs the streets of Cagliari, a pushy red haired American, and his brother, who thinks his gift might help him understand longevity and immortality.Now Alessio has no choice but to paint a life.ï»¿
author: Kristina Catlin
